name: Al Mu'akhir
description: Al Mu'akhir is one of the names of Allah, which means 'The Delayer'. It refers to God's control over time and His ability to postpone events according to His wisdom.
summary: The name Al Mu'akhir emphasizes the concept that Allah has the ultimate authority over what happens when, reminding believers that everything unfolds in the timing that is best according to divine wisdom. Its origin can be traced to the Arabic language and Islamic teachings, reflecting the understanding of God's nature as encompassing all aspects of time and existence.
